alert.note: Alert for Bee; Goliad; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 7:46PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL SAN PATRICIO... SOUTHWESTERN VICTORIA...SOUTHEASTERN GOLIAD...NORTHWESTERN REFUGIO AND SOUTHEASTERN BEE COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM CDT... At 746 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fannin to near Skidmore. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Refugio, Skidmore, Fannin, Coleto Creek Park, Oak Village, and Blanconia. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 648 and 668. US Highway 59 between mile markers 650 and 658. US Highway 77 between mile markers 598 and 608. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Bee; Goliad; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio; Victoria
